name: guard-swap
effect: User swaps its Defense and Special Defense modifiers with the target.
short_effect: User swaps Defense and Special Defense changes with the target.

flavor_text.sword_shield: The user employs its psychic power to switch changes to its Defense and Sp. Def stats with the target.
flavor_text.legends_arceus: The user employs its psychic power to switch changes to its Defense and Sp. Def stats with the target.
